page.title: 07HOME LIFE
page.content:
{ {A Saturday in the Life of Nathan {Bradley, age 7.
On Saturday 8th June 1985 my mum and I went to the beach at Portobello. We caught crabs, fish and a baby eel. We also collected some rocks for my mum's garden. When we got home we got washed, changed and went up town to do some shopping for my brother's birthday and for my holidays in Portugal. I chose a pair of swimming trunks. After tea I went with my dad to the jet spray to wash the car. The water came out so fast that the hose nearly jumped out of my hand. Later I played with my computer and then I went to bed. Nathan Bradley.
